parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the radiator housing can cause a loss of antifreeze, leading to engine overheating, damage to electrical sensors, and potentially causing the engine to shut down, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: Steam or smoke coming from under the hood

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the thermostat housing sensor can cause the engine to shut down, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: smoke or steam coming from the vents
damaged electrical sensors on the engine.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause the vehicle to hesitate or accelerate without warning, leading to loss of control and potential accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle hesitates or accelerates without warning
the transmission slips or downshifts harshly
the vehicle is unable to move or accelerate.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering pump mounting can cause the serpentine drive belt to come off the drive pulleys, leading to a loss of power steering, which can result in accidents or near-misses due to sudden and unexpected increases in steering effort.
symptoms: serpentine drive belt coming off the drive pulleys
power steering pump loose or broken
